pkgmetadata.longdescription: # System Bridge Connector - Python[![CI](https://github.com/timmo001/system-bridge-connector-py/actions/workflows/ci.yml/badge.svg)](https://github.com/timmo001/system-bridge-connector-py/actions/workflows/ci.yml)![CodeQL](https://github.com/timmo001/system-bridge-connector-py/workflows/CodeQL/badge.svg)Python package for connecting to [System Bridge](https://github.com/timmo001/system-bridge).![Logo](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/timmo001/system-bridge/master/public/system-bridge-rect.png)
